title: Reliant® DAUNTLESS Water Purifier
features: Reliant® Dauntless RO Water Purifier system uses reverse osmosis (RO) technology
RO technology is recognized as highly effective at significantly reducing a large number of contaminants in water
The system offers unmatched protection and reliability compared to other home water treatment systems
The Reliant® Dauntless system features a stylish design that fits elegantly in any kitchen environment
It has clean lines and graceful contours
The cabinet is bright white, making it the most attractive reverse osmosis water system available

specification.Product: Seven Stages with RO + UV + UF + pH Enhancer
